QuestData.Title: Twinspire Keep
QuestData.Description: I do not trust this Horde. They wield foul magic, and their intentions are clearly malevolent. We can no longer stand their presence in Twinspire Keep, so close to Paw'don.$b$bI beg you, visitor: thin their numbers before they do something awful to this village.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 15 Horde troops in Twinspire Keep.
QuestData.CompletionText: Gol' dang, but there's a bunch of 'em down there...
QuestData.RewardText: One heck of a bloody mess y'made down there, kid.$b$bNice work.
